1.content:
You had been picked up at the airport by a private limousine and driven to an enormous mansion -
easily twice the size of a large stadium - in the middle of nowhere. After leaving the car, it sped off.
As you ascend the stairs to the entrance, a tall, buxom woman sashays out to meet you, clasping
your hand and shaking it heartily. "Welcome." Illyana says in a hot Russian accent. "Welcome to
my home..."
1.title: Welcome to the Orgy!

114.content:
You decide to set your sights upon the biggest meal in the house so far, none other than legendary perma preggo herself, Reiko Asagi. You figure by the time you down her, at least someone else will have eaten some other people, and you'll just eat that person up. A simple plan, but a solid one that couldn't fail at all. Now it was time to put it into motion. Without a second thought, you stride over to Reiko who seems to look perplexed at the moment.

"Hello there Reiko," you begin as you close the distance between you and your future meal.

"Oh hi there, I take it you were invited too?" Reiko asks snapping out of her perplexed trance.

"Yes I was, my name's Alice," you reply coolly.

"Ah, nice to meet you Alice," she pats her pregnant belly happily.

"Slow party, huh?"

"It's kind of how things start, and then before you know it, only a couple people are left full and satisfied," Reiko elaborates. "Or when I'm involved, only one."

"I see... How about you and I continue our conversation in private?"

"Sounds good, it'll give us something to do before the fun begins."

You both smirk at the same time, as if you both have the same plans in mind. The two of you leave to walk together to try and find a nice place alone. While you find it in odd taste, a large bathroom is currently completely vacant. As you lead her inside, its time to put the plan into action!
114.title: Reiko

choices: Miss Illyana herself standing before you, and she looks pleased.
An eager, and probably hungry, Jenna Adams right in front of you.
No one there. Go back to the room you were before.

You managed to swallow past her shoulders and she didn't struggle or even scream with how you caught her by surprise. You're almost disappointed about how easy Reiko was. As you swallow her down, you slow down when you reach her belly to savor its flavor, and after you finish swallowing that, you just slurp up her legs. After that, you rub your Reiko occupied belly in content as you feel her move around in her new temporary prison.

"Thanks Reiko, I was getting pretty hungry," you say with a couple last pats to your belly as you begin to leave the bathroom. "But don't worry Reiko, I'll make sure you have plenty of company in there."

As you open the door, you find...
1141.title: You manage to devour Reiko!

12.content:

patting your pregnant belly. You came wearing a sports bra and yoga pants, needing the
room to stretch for all the people you want to put inside you.

"It's a pleasure to meet you." You say, waddling inside as she leads you to...

121.content:
After a short walk down a wide hallway Illyana stops in front of a large ornate door.

"Do you wish to have a meal before the orgy?" Asks Illyana. "Most guests seem to prefer to enter the orgy with something already in their belly."

"Yeah, a quick meal sounds good." You say with a nod

Illyana clapped her hands together loudly "Well then, behind this door lies the dinner room. Inside there are several pre-prepared preggos just waiting to be eaten." She says, before pushing the door open.

The room inside is filled with an enormous table, every inch of which is covered by a platter with a preggo on it. Just the sight of all these juicy preggos is making your mouth water.

"Take your pick Reiko, but I recommend you only take one, you'll want to save some room for later" Says Illyana with a flourishing gesture towards the table.

info.brief_description: An eccentric billionaire is throwing a party for hungry, horny vores! AN ORIGINAL STORY!
info.description:
Miss Illyana Svedka is a Russian debutant of about 29 years of age. She owns the largest home in the United States and has invited all of the world's most famous and notorious vores to her house for a weekend long orgy, hoping that everyone has a great time and only intending for a quarter of the vores to make it home due to the fact that reforming prey will be strictly prohibited. Other than that, though; there are no rules!

CHARACTERS

Alice Mayweather
Age: 19
Race: African American
Weight: 123 pounds
Having come to the orgy due to her legendary hunger, Alice intends to come home fat and happy.

Reiko Asagi
Age: 23
Race: Asian
Weight: 150 pounds
Permanently pregnant with triplets at about nine months' development, Reiko is a legendary vore due to the hunger her permanent pregnancy has cursed her with. She has come to finally sate it or die trying.

Jenna Adams
Age: 34
Race: White
Weight: 134 pounds
A vore porn star on the tail end of her career, Jenna is among the best in the world. She has come with the intention of writing a book about her last voracious journey: the ultimate vorgy!

Mike Franklin
Age: 23
Race: African American
Weight: 135 pounds
A well hung predator, Mike was invited due to his immense hunger and his desire to be the sexiest man alive. Loves to cock vore women.

Anthony Fremont
Age: 18
Race: White
Weight: 112 pounds
A lightweight soccer star from England, Anthony was invited after he accidentally ate a team mates wife to cover an affair. Illyana seems to have a slight crush on him.
info.pretty_title: The Vore Orgy at Mitchell Palace
